title: Nata Sans
content:
hello typophiles, This is my first contact, and I would like some help. This is my first typeface, still in process, and I would like to have your opinions about it. I have just begun working on it... Best Regards

Nata em pdf
natasans1.pdf (10.6 k)
author: matheus

comments.content:
some nice glyphs. however widths are a bit inconsistant. is this intentional?   
Too thin--e,m,n   
Too thick--k,z

Nice humanist feel there.   
   
After you're done with inconsistencies, tend to the awkward corners in "w", "v", "y" for instance.

matheus,   
   
alguns pontos que saltam a prmeira   
vista:   
1. a diferen
